title: Biden Will Travel to Houston on Friday Amid Crisis in Texas
sub_head: The president will meet with state and local officials and visit a coronavirus health center during the trip, the White House said
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Biden will travel to Houston on Friday as Texas grapples with the aftermath of the freezing temperatures that rocked the state last week, the White House said.
The president will meet with state and local officials and visit a coronavirus health center during the trip, according to White House press secretary Jen Psaki.
Mr. Biden signed a disaster declaration for the state on Saturday, covering 77 counties considered the hardest hit and providing grants for temporary housing and home repairs, low-cost loans for residents to pay for uninsured property damage and other aid for residents and business owners.
Ms. Psaki said Tuesday that the individual assistance had been extended to 31 additional counties.
The administration has also provided equipment and supplies to the states hit hardest by the winter freeze, including generators, fuel blankets and water.
